inclusion.criterion: Documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic stroke/TIA due to arterial dissection
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac source of embolism without documented atherosclerotic stenosis
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has recent ischemic stroke and documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery, but is excluded due to cardiac source of embolism without documented atherosclerotic stenosis.
